docs.lead_paragraph: PROCEEDINGS of the National Health Assembly in Washington last week put a lot of stress on "positive health." Dr. Leona Baumgartner, chairman of the Assembly's Maternal and Child Health Section talked about this in an interview the other day.
docs.abstract: C Mackenzie on Dr Baumgartner views on children's ills
docs.snippet: PROCEEDINGS of the National Health Assembly in Washington last week put a lot of stress on "positive health." Dr. Leona Baumgartner, chairman of the Assembly's Maternal and Child Health Section talked about this in an interview the other day.
